segments.source_content: Use the [`tags` plugin option](#tags) to configure the path of a YAML tags file.

translations.zh-hant: 使用 [`tags` 插件選項](#tags) 來配置 YAML 標籤檔案的路徑。

segments.source_content: By convention, the plugin will look for a `tags.yml` file at the root of your content folder(s).

translations.zh-hant: 按照慣例，插件會在內容資料夾的根目錄中尋找 `tags.yml` 檔案。

segments.source_content: This file can contain a list of predefined tags. You can reference these tags by their keys in Markdown files thanks to the [`tags` front matter](#markdown-front-matter).

translations.zh-hant: 此檔案可以包含預定義的標籤列表。你可以透過 [`tags` front matter](#markdown-front-matter) 在 Markdown 檔案中引用這些標籤的鍵值。

segments.source_content:
:::tip[Keeping tags consistent]

Using a tags file, you can ensure that your tags usage is consistent across your plugin content set. Use the [`onInlineTags: 'throw'`](#onInlineTags) plugin option to enforce this consistency and prevent usage of inline tags declared on the fly.

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::tip[保持標籤一致性]

使用標籤檔案可以確保你的標籤使用在插件內容集中保持一致。使用 [`onInlineTags: 'throw'`](#onInlineTags) 插件選項來強制執行這種一致性，並防止使用臨時宣告的內聯標籤。

:::

segments.source_content: The YAML content of the provided tags file should respect the following shape:

translations.zh-hant: 提供的標籤檔案的 YAML 內容應符合以下結構：

segments.source_content:
```yml title="tags.yml"
releases:
  label: 'Product releases'
  permalink: '/product-releases'
  description: 'Content related to product releases.'

# A partial tag definition is also valid
announcements:
  label: 'Announcements'

# An empty tag definition is also valid
# Other attributes will be inferred from the key
emptyTag:
```

```md title="content.md"
---
tags: [releases, announcements, emptyTag]
---

# Title

Content
```
